body:
Add a check in createChildWorkflowHandle that it gets a registered workflow (e.g. exported) and verify that the function name matches the export name.

As brought up here: https://temporalio.slack.com/archives/C01DKSMU94L/p1632714328118100

comments.body: Note that we cannot validate in cases where the handle is created for a different task queue (Worker), adding a check for child handles on the same Worker.

title: [Feature Request] Provide better error message when creating a child workflow which is not registered
